title: The most spoken languages worldwide
summary: This is a bar chart representing Languages in the x axis and Native speaker in millions in the y axis.
The Native speaker in millions is appeared to be the highest at Languages Chinese and lowest at Languages Lahnda.
Languages Lahnda has 11.02 times less Native speaker in millions than Languages Chinese which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Languages, and Native speaker in millions in each Languages on the y axis.
The Native speaker in millions is highest at Languages Chinese and lowest at Languages Lahnda.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Languages in the x axis and Native speaker in millions in the y axis.
The Native speaker in millions is appeared to be the highest at Languages Chinese and lowest at Languages Lahnda.
Languages Lahnda has 11.02 times less Native speaker in millions than Languages Chinese which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Native speaker in millions for 10 number of Languagess.
The maximum Native speaker in millions 1311.0 is found at Languages Chinese and the minimum is found at Lahnda where Languages is 119.0.
There is a difference of 1192.0 between the maximum Languages Chinese and minimum Languages Lahnda.
Languages Chinese is higher than any other Languagess with value 1311.0, followed by Spanish, and English. Down to Languages Lahnda with the lowest value 119.0.
The average Native speaker in millions in all 10 Languagess is 366.0.
Summing up the values of all Languagess, we get total 3660.0.
